about.description: I'm a skilled full-stack developer with hands-on experience building modern web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, MySQL, and Laravel. I've built secure admin dashboards, financial tools, and authentication systems with JWT and Clerk (OAuth2). I also have a background in AI, data science, and systems administration, and I'm always eager to explore new tools and challenges.
